con:config.script:
def Company_Name = context.expand( '${#[Regression Suite#Add company]#Company_Name}' ) Company_Name_JDBC = Company_Name.replace("\"", "'") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Company_Name_JDBC", Company_Name_JDBC) log.info Company_Name testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Company_Name", Company_Name)
def Email_ID = context.expand( '${#[Regression Suite#Invite Company]#Email_ID}' ) Email_ID = "\"" + Email_ID + "\"" testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Email_ID", Email_ID)
